title: been a long time since i made one of these posts, because i wasnt at the trash pit elo for a while
body:
But guess what i dropped there again, and in turn, ive started trash pit players again, and holy shit, i forgot how fucking badly they piss me off.

Im begging you riot, literally fucking on my knees ready to suck your cock begging, add a minimum skill requirement test to play ranked.

Hell make it a quiz if you have to.

ANYTHING, to weed out the retards.

Because literally, they are all down here, its a fucking echo chamber of stupid.

You lose 20 games in a row from playing drunk and tilted as fuck, and boom you stop winning games.

Because its not that the players are bad, some of them are quite good, its that they are all insanely fucking stupid.

Tiltingly stupid.

Let me paint a picture right, this elo, is an elo of players so trash, i can go 6/1 as caitlyn top, building  5 infinity edges, because none of them will build armor.

But unless im a 1v9 god, i wont win, because the other 4 players on my team are just as bad.

And it doesnt matter how stupid you are, you are going to focus the 6/1 caitlyn every time to they try to backdoor, or in every teamfight.

In turn, games last an hour, an hour of my time, for a coin flip on whether or not we win.

because unless i go 20/0 in the first 20 minutes, i am not winning that game early.

Unless i get lucky and even one other player, just one of them, has  more than 5 brain cells, i am not winning that game early.

And what are the implications of not winning a game early? simple, in a 1 hour game, everyone has full build and is level 18.

And the thing about that is, unless you are faker, or anyone else who is grossly out of their skill bracket, not just better, but ALOT better.

You wont 1v5 teamfights, that is just a fact.

You might do it occasionally, but you wont do it consistently, and if you could consistently, you wouldnt be bronze.

So why is it, That every time i get to b5, i have to rely on rng to get back out.

Because quite literally b3 and up, i win, like 60% of the time.

Like 85% winrate mid.

low lp b3 and under, and that changes instantly, i go from winning the majority of my games to losing the majority of my games.

Statistically that doesnt make sense, playing against better players should mean, i lose more games.

So why do i win more games the higher elo i go, unless the reason i keep losing, is because stupid fucking players, piss me off, so much, that i stop playing good.

Aka.

TILT.

replies.body:
maybe you should

GIT GUD
I
T

G
U
D

Dude, you aren't good at League of Legends. That tier is trash, and why are you in it?. Everyone wins more games the higher they get matched with, but you aren't climbing are you. If you get matched higher you play safer and more competitively, and cs more efficiently. You need to stop blaming your team, find a one trick champion and climb if you really deserve higher. 

http://imgur.com/a/SWYqu

http://imgur.com/a/fmRDU

3 seasons of bronze 5.

ive been bronze 5 for one season. weve been over this.

In every other season i was b fucking 1, is it still bronze, yes.

is it b fucking 5, fuck no.

Why am i b5 right now? 800 games of dynamic queue, 800 games of SOLO dynamic queue, 800 games, of solo dynamic queue in an elo where i can win lane, but cant 1v9.

Ive played less than 400 games this season, i havnt fixed my mmr yet.

keyword, yet.
Just take a step back try to reset then get back in the thick of it. Gl.

Cool cut out, one losing streak, which is the focus of my rage above, shit teams game after game, now literally go back another 10 games down, oh shit, i won more games in a row, than i lost in that losing streak.

Fuck... its almost like the last 20 games is not a good indicator of skill.

Overall is.

And overall, besides the last 100 games in b5, ive been 70% winrate in b2.

The last 100 games in b5, is why i have the winrate i do right now.

For future reference, actually do your research before you claim to know someones situation, else you just come off as an illiterate fuckwit like you just did.

no one thinks i come out as illiterate or dumb, you are bronze. if you were better than bronze and play this many games, your team wouldn't be able to pull you down. end of story. you are toxic and need to reform before you will go anywhere.
Well your first problem is that you're playing kindred jungle when she's literally trash tier atm

None of those kindred games are jungle.

The lower elo i go the more restrictions i put on myself as to what lane and champ i play.

If i played nothing but meta champs in low elo id be even more pissed when i lose.

Hell take the zed mid games, im playing zed mid not because hes meta, but because i have like 5 games played with him.

a 5 games played zed, that is consistently going like 7/1 during lane phase, and he "belongs in this elo"

A kalista mid player with a 60% winrate over over 100 games in the mid lane.

An ap shaco player who can go 25/7 in the mid lane, with 6 of those deaths being an udyr running him down stunning into xin three talon strike, after being fed by vayne because our malz afk'd. i was 14/1 at some point in that game.

Mechanically i am a better player, hell even my macro is better in most parts, i fully understand that if there is 3 top i should 100% go an take that bot tower, that alone puts my macro play ahead of my elo, because i dont have to be told, they do.

No the reason why i lose, is i may be better in most areas, but i am not better to such a degree where i can consistently 1v3/5 because thats what happens in every game i play, i absolutely DUMPSTER my laner, go some insane score like 9/1 then get the entire enemy team sitting on my ass, and my team is never good enough to take advantage of the fact that their team is now ignoring them as i am the only threat, as such i consistently end up in 3v1 ambushes and shit because its either i sit in our own jungle because thats where my team is, or i get killed trying to be productive and actually take objectives.

And theres more evidence to point to that, namely my winrate at b1 was 70%

My winrate at b5, has just dropped below 50%

How can i consistently carry games, at an elo 4 tiers above where i am right now, but cant even carry this shitty elo.

Think about that for a second before you reply, because my case, completely defies the usual player logic of "well if your teams bad so is the enemy team"

because ill repeat, i win more games, against higher elo players, that doesnt make any sense when you apply the general consensus of how elo works.

I mean fuck i even know how to fucking play from behind, the number of games ive gone like 1/5 in lane from being gank spammed then come out the end of the game 15/7 because i just farmed and played safe, is through the fucking roof.

But none of those skills help me 1v9, they make it easier, but they dont enable it.

At the same time, in higher elo's playing with players more around my level, those skills are invaluable, you need to know how to ward, you need to know how to abuse lane pressure, you need to know how to play safe, because if you dont, you lose, because the enemy team isnt made up of absolute spastics and will take advantage of that, and thats why i win in that elo, because i dont make those mistakes.

In bronze 5, it doesnt matter how good your macro play is, bronze 5, is 100% a hard carry elo, you HAVE to 1v9, you cant rely on anyone to know what the fuck they are doing, and you can expect the enemy team to be greedy and kill focused, so they will run you down if they see you.

Your own team will expect you to fight by yourself because of how fed you are.

Basically, in b5, unless you know how to 1v9, getting fed, is like sealing your own coffin.

Edit:

And just to reiterate when i say i dont make those mistakes, im not saying im perfect, of course i make mistakes, but i dont make those particular ones, because those are the skills i have focused on, because why try to learn how to play at chaos 5, when i can learn how to play at every elo aside from chaos 5.

Why is it chaos 5 and not bronze 5? simple, its pure chaos, i have literally won games playing full ap warwick pre rework, in the bot lane, as the adc role. there is no structure, everyone down here is shit, and the meta goes out the window, no one itemizes correctly, and being a better player doesnt inherently mean you can win, this is the league of throws after all, all it takes is me being the only good player on the team and getting 1v5'd once to lose the game, because my team wont be able to do jack shit against them since if they can 1v5 me they fed in the first place.

Ask any smurf whos played in b5 coming from plat and up, the first thing they will tell you is that all strategy goes out the window, its either you 1v9 or you go down with the sinking ship, you cant expect even the slightly shred of teamwork.

The most teamwork you will get is if you have someone on their team low enough to kill and you are low, someone else will come in to get kill credit, thats it.

stop thinking you are better than you are. disco heat plays random picks and builds all the time, and hes diamond lol. you think you are like a b5 smurf from plat and up? you have no shot calling skill. you have been bronze 5 in 3 seasons now.

Oh and one other thing.

Shot calling skill? have you fucking played in bronze in the last, oh i dunno 9 years.

To shot call, first people need to listen to your calls.

Bronzies wont listen to shit.

if i tell them that baroning right now is a bad idea, they will ignore me, infact they will feel more inclined to do it to spite me.

And then low and behold "enemy quadra kill"

And all i get to do is gloat after the fact that my team is retarded for not listening to me.

Mmmhmm, difference is, hes diamond.

im not.

Holy shit dificult concept.

Do i think im plat? fuck no.

Am i quoting plat smurfs when i say the things i say?

fuck yes.

is arguing against me the equivelent of arguing against plat and up because im literally just regurgitating their information? yes.

Hell arguing with me that you dont need to be 3 tiers above your elo to 1v9 carry, is arguing with foxdrop, do you know who foxdrop is?

because if you did, you wouldnt fucking argue about it.

No time to read this long post, but i recently went to GOLD from Trash Elo, if i can do it any 1 can do it. If you cant do it you meant to me in that elo. Learn to 1v9 all games. If you think in this way only then you can climb.

Aka
GOLD

> [{quoted}](name=GBG727,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=T8G3Z6oP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-01T07:45:36.886+0000)
>
> No time to read this long post, but i recently went to GOLD from Trash Elo, if i can do it any 1 can do it. If you cant do it you meant to me in that elo. Learn to 1v9 all games. If you think in this way only then you can climb.
> 
> Aka
> GOLD

Gold is still trash elo. what

so now a trash Silver 3 tell me Gold is trash elo hmmmm, ok i accpect from a trash silver player that gold is actually trash

Ps: comment is coming this is not my main i am high elo {{item:3070}}

issue is, if i was good enough to 1v9 i wouldnt be bronze.

But the entire mentality of "if you cant make up for the other 4 players on your team then you belong there" is flawed in and of itself.

As its basically saying, to get out of that elo you need to be 3 tiers better than that elo.

or as foxdrop put it, 
"to solo carry yourself out of an elo you need to not just be better but undeniably better.

You are a dwarf among gnomes when you need to be a giant, basically."


There are times where im in a good mood and i demonstrate that i am visibly better than the elo i play at, the same games where both teams tend to commend my plays with random quips like "this kalista is actually aspergers level good" shit like that (a comment i received after 1v5ing the enemy team in their own base and getting 3 towers during the fight by just hopping around dodging every skill shot)

can i play that good every day? fuck no, because within 1 to 2 games of this elo i get so tilted that i devolve back into the usual shitty "fuck you for feeding X champion because now they one shot me in every teamfight" player.

Which is what pisses me off the most, the fact that i have proven time and time again that i actually dont belong here, infact out of my 400 games this season, 200-300 of them were in b2-b1, the only reason im b5, is because i started working, so now im playing with nothing but 13 year olds who came back from school, as such they have the mental and emotional maturity to match and in turn push every single last one of my buttons, tilting me before i even get out of champ select.

Because if theres any one thing that pisses me off, its stupid people, and bronze 5 is full of them.

i just read ur 1st paragraph let me tell you, i was G3 today drop to G5, doesn't matter sometimes just hard luck or bad games now i am getting s2-s3 trash players but idgaf bcoz i know i will climb, just 1-2-3 days bad then again you can climb,

i climb to gold after 3 years, getting 4 accounts ban in LOL 5th this one is on last stage but finally i am gold and i am still learning. 

" if i was good enough to 1v9"  believe in yourself doesn't matter you lose 100 games but finally you will get exp and then you can carry. Remember you re getting the advise of this toxic guy who is been banned 4 times, and if i am saying its possible it is
